# OpenTofu provider for PingOne SCIM Provisioning

This provider is used to bridge the gap in the official PingOne Terraform provider and enable the creation of SCIM
provisioning connections/rules via OpenTofu.

## Warning

This provider was vibe-coded and was intended for our own internal testing purposes only. We are in no way affiliated
with PingOne, and take no responsibility for the correctness of the implementation, or damage this provider may cause
within your PingOne environment.
